constraints_details.result: Hinterland Lower Lea Valley including Stratford

description: Redevelopment of site to provide buildings of between four (11.8 metres) and eleven storeys (32.2 metres) for mixed uses purposes including 191 residential units Class A1, A2, A3 and B1 uses with associated basement and ground level car parking and cycle provision.
